attributes.action: CLOSE SCHOOLS DOWN BECAUSE OF CORONA VIRUS ESCALATION
attributes.additional_details: Contact with older teachers within confined spaces without much hygiene within canteens or bathrooms may lead to students getting the virus. Concerns of students getting virus whilst it may go undetected and spreading it to family leading to a loss of loved ones. If the main concern is students not having food or parents looking after children, what do parents do when students are on holiday? Do students just starve within the 6 weeks of summer break without school food?
attributes.background: To close schools before GCSE's and A-levels so Corona Virus spreads at a slower rate and students are still able to take exams without delay.
